projects.name: Business site
projects.text: A calming, responsive landing page promoting gardening joy and creative love. Focused on visual design, accessibility, and mobile-first performance.

projects.name: Recipe Library
projects.text: An accessible, responsive recipe app showcasing a dynamic collection of meals. Focused on clean design, intuitive navigation, and optimized performance across all screen sizes.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.text: A clean and responsive weather app that adapts to real-time conditions across the Nordic region. It dynamically fetches data and updates the interface to deliver an intuitive and engaging user experience.

projects.name: Quiz app
projects.text: A mobile-friendly web quiz about accessibility, built with pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Focused on education, responsiveness, and ease of use.
